verses.verse: הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> Behold יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Behold the LORD בּוֹקֵ֥ק <WH1238> empty הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> maketh the earth וּבֽוֹלְקָ֑הּ <WH1110> and maketh it waste וְעִוָּ֣ה <WH5753> and turneth פָנֶ֔יהָ <WH6440> it upside down וְהֵפִ֖יץ <WH6327> and scattereth abroad יֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3427> the inhabitants

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become כָעָם֙ <WH5971> And it shall be as with the people כַּכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> so with the priest כַּעֶ֙בֶד֙ <WH5650> as with the servant כַּֽאדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> so with his master כַּשִּׁפְחָ֖ה <WH8198> as with the maid כַּגְּבִרְתָּ֑הּ <WH1404> so with her mistress כַּקּוֹנֶה֙ <WH7069> as with the buyer כַּמּוֹכֵ֔ר <WH4376> so with the seller כַּמַּלְוֶה֙ <WH3867> as with the lender כַּלֹּוֶ֔ה <WH3867> so with the borrower כַּנֹּשֶׁ֕ה <WH5383> as with the taker of usury כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> so נֹשֶׁ֥א <WH5378> with the giver of usury בֽוֹ׃

הִבּ֧וֹק ׀ <WH1238> shall be utterly תִּבּ֛וֹק <WH1238> emptied הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> The land וְהִבּ֣וֹז ׀ <WH962> and utterly תִּבּ֑וֹז <WH962> spoiled כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> hath spoken אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אָבְלָ֤ה <WH56> mourneth נָֽבְלָה֙ <WH5034> [and] fadeth away הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> The earth אֻמְלְלָ֥ה <WH535> languisheth נָבְלָ֖ה <WH5034> [and] fadeth away תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> the world אֻמְלָ֖לוּ <WH535> do languish מְר֥וֹם <WH4791> the haughty עַם־ <WH5971> people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> The earth חָנְפָ֖ה <WH2610> also is defiled תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Thahash יֹשְׁבֶ֑יהָ <WH3427> under the inhabitants כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָבְר֤וּ <WH5674> thereof because they have transgressed תוֹרֹת֙ <WH8451> the laws חָ֣לְפוּ <WH2498> changed חֹ֔ק <WH2706> the ordinance הֵפֵ֖רוּ <WH6565> broken בְּרִ֥ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> the everlasting

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that אָלָה֙ <WH423> Therefore hath the curse אָ֣כְלָה <WH398> devoured אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וַֽיֶּאְשְׁמ֖וּ <WH816> therein are desolate יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> and they that dwell בָ֑הּ עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that חָרוּ֙ <WH2787> are burned יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> therefore the inhabitants אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth וְנִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> left אֱנ֖וֹשׁ <WH582> men מִזְעָֽר׃ <WH4213> and few

אָבַ֥ל <WH56> mourneth תִּיר֖וֹשׁ <WH8492> The new wine אֻמְלְלָה־ <WH535> languisheth גָ֑פֶן <WH1612> the vine נֶאֶנְח֖וּ <WH584> do sigh כָּל־ <WH3605> All שִׂמְחֵי־ <WH8056> glad לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> care for

שָׁבַת֙ <WH7673> ceaseth מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <WH4885> The mirth תֻּפִּ֔ים <WH8596> of tabrets חָדַ֖ל <WH2308> endeth שְׁא֣וֹן <WH7588> the noise עַלִּיזִ֑ים <WH5947> of them that rejoice שָׁבַ֖ת <WH7673> ceaseth מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <WH4885> the joy כִּנּֽוֹר׃ <WH3658> of the harp

בַּשִּׁ֖יר <WH7892> with a song לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׁתּוּ־ <WH8354> They shall not drink יָ֑יִן <WH3196> wine יֵמַ֥ר <WH4843> shall be bitter שֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> strong drink לְשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <WH8354> to them that drink

נִשְׁבְּרָ֖ה <WH7665> is broken down קִרְיַת־ <WH7151> The city תֹּ֑הוּ <WH8414> of confusion סֻגַּ֥ר <WH5462> is shut up כָּל־ <WH3605> Every בַּ֖יִת <WH1004> every house מִבּֽוֹא׃ <WH935> that no man may come in

צְוָחָ֥ה <WH6682> [There is] a crying עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַיַּ֖יִן <WH3196> for wine בַּֽחוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> in the streets עָֽרְבָה֙ <WH6150> is darkened כָּל־ <WH3605> All שִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> all joy גָּלָ֖ה <WH1540> is gone מְשׂ֥וֹשׂ <WH4885> the mirth הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land
נִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> is left בָּעִ֖יר <WH5892> In the city שַׁמָּ֑ה <WH8047> desolation וּשְׁאִיָּ֖ה <WH7591> with destruction יֻכַּת־ <WH3807> is smitten שָֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> and the gate

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֥ה <WH3541> thus יִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> will be in בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> When thus it shall be in the midst הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> among הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the people כְּנֹ֣קֶף <WH5363> [there shall be] as the shaking זַ֔יִת <WH2132> of an olive tree כְּעוֹלֵלֹ֖ת <WH5955> [and] as the gleaning grapes אִם־ <WH518> when כָּלָ֥ה <WH3615> is done בָצִֽיר׃ <WH1210> when the vintage

הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> They יִשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> They shall lift up קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> their voice יָרֹ֑נּוּ <WH7442> they shall sing בִּגְא֣וֹן <WH1347> for the majesty יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God צָהֲל֖וּ <WH6670> they shall cry aloud מִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> from the sea

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> in בָּאֻרִ֖ים <WH217> in the fires כַּבְּד֣וּ <WH3513> Wherefore glorify יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> ye the LORD בְּאִיֵּ֣י <WH339> in the isles הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> [even] the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

מִכְּנַ֨ף <WH3671> From the uttermost part הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the earth זְמִרֹ֤ת <WH2158> songs שָׁמַ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH8085> have we heard צְבִ֣י <WH6643> [even] glory לַצַּדִּ֔יק <WH6662> to the righteous וָאֹמַ֛ר <WH559> But I said רָזִי־ <WH7334> My leanness לִ֥י רָֽזִי־ <WH7334> my leanness לִ֖י א֣וֹי <WH188> woe לִ֑י בֹּגְדִ֣ים <WH898> unto me the treacherous dealers בָּגָ֔דוּ <WH898> have dealt treacherously וּבֶ֥גֶד <WH899> have dealt very בּוֹגְדִ֖ים <WH898> yea the treacherous dealers בָּגָֽדוּ׃ <WH898> treacherously
פַּ֥חַד <WH6343> Fear וָפַ֖חַת <WH6354> and the pit וָפָ֑ח <WH6341> and the snare עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> Confront יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> [are] upon thee O inhabitant הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become הַנָּ֞ס <WH5127> And it shall come to pass [that] he who fleeth מִקּ֤וֹל <WH6963> from the noise הַפַּ֙חַד֙ <WH6343> of the fear יִפֹּ֣ל <WH5307> shall fall אֶל־ <WH413> into הַפַּ֔חַת <WH6354> into the pit וְהָֽעוֹלֶה֙ <WH5927> and he that cometh up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הַפַּ֔חַת <WH6354> of the pit יִלָּכֵ֖ד <WH3920> shall be taken בַּפָּ֑ח <WH6341> in the snare כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֲרֻבּ֤וֹת <WH699> for the windows מִמָּרוֹם֙ <WH4791> from on high נִפְתָּ֔חוּ <WH6605> are open וַֽיִּרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> do shake מ֥וֹסְדֵי <WH4146> and the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

רֹ֥עָה <WH7489> is utterly הִֽתְרֹעֲעָ֖ה <WH7489> broken down הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> The earth פּ֤וֹר <WH6565> is clean הִֽתְפּוֹרְרָה֙ <WH6565> dissolved אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth מ֥וֹט <WH4131> is moved הִֽתְמוֹטְטָ֖ה <WH4131> exceedingly אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

נ֣וֹעַ <WH5128> shall reel תָּנ֤וּעַ <WH5128> to and fro אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> The earth כַּשִּׁכּ֔וֹר <WH7910> like a drunkard וְהִֽתְנוֹדְדָ֖ה <WH5110> and shall be removed כַּמְּלוּנָ֑ה <WH4412> like a cottage וְכָבַ֤ד <WH3513> thereof shall be heavy עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> and פִּשְׁעָ֔הּ <WH6588> and the transgression וְנָפְלָ֖ה <WH5307> upon it and it shall fall וְלֹא־ <WH3808> never תֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> again קֽוּם׃ <WH6965> and not rise ס

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> will happen בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he יִפְקֹ֧ד <WH6485> shall punish יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [that] the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and צְבָ֥א <WH6635> the host הַמָּר֖וֹם <WH4791> of the high ones בַּמָּר֑וֹם <WH4791> [that are] on high וְעַל־ <WH5921> and מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> and the kings הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <WH127> of the earth עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> upon the earth

וְאֻסְּפ֨וּ <WH622> And they shall be gathered together אֲסֵפָ֤ה <WH626> are gathered אַסִּיר֙ <WH616> [as] prisoners עַל־ <WH5921> in בּ֔וֹר <WH953> in the pit וְסֻגְּר֖וּ <WH5462> and shall be shut up עַל־ <WH5921> in מַסְגֵּ֑ר <WH4525> in the prison וּמֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> and after many יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days יִפָּקֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6485> shall they be visited

וְחָֽפְרָה֙ <WH2659> shall be confounded הַלְּבָנָ֔ה <WH3842> Then the moon וּבוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH954> ashamed הַֽחַמָּ֑ה <WH2535> and the sun כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָלַ֞ךְ <WH4427> shall reign יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> when the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּהַ֤ר <WH2022> in mount צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> Zion וּבִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> and in Jerusalem וְנֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> will be before זְקֵנָ֖יו <WH2205> and before his ancients כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> gloriously פ
